words.definition: An affair is an event or a thing that happened.
words.example: My wife and I attended a formal affair over the weekend.

words.definition: An assembly is a group that is together for the same reason.
words.example: The students had an assembly to talk about their interests.

words.definition: To bless is to ask God for protection or help.
words.example: The angel blessed the newborn baby to keep it safe.

words.definition: Cereal is a food that you mix with milk and eat for breakfast.
words.example: Cereal is a fast and common breakfast food enjoyed in the U.S.

words.definition: If someone is cheerful, they are happy and smiling.
words.example: She GS was very cheerful today.

words.definition: The diameter is the length of a straight line through the center of a circle.
words.example: The GS diameter of the circle was ten inches.

words.definition: To exploit something is to use it for your own benefit.
words.example: The GS company exploited the natural resources.

words.definition: A famine is a long period of time with very little food.
words.example: The GS famine caused many people to suffer.

words.definition: A harvest is the act of gathering crops.
words.example: The GS farmers were busy with the harvest.

words.definition: If someone is merry, they are happy and cheerful.
words.example: We GS had a merry time at the party.

words.definition: A nut is a dry fruit with a hard shell.
words.example: The GS squirrel was eating a nut.

words.definition: A pardon is the act of forgiving someone for a crime.
words.example: The GS king gave him a pardon.

words.definition: A pharaoh was a king in ancient Egypt.
words.example: The GS pharaoh was buried in a pyramid.

words.definition: If a fruit is ripe, it is ready to be eaten.
words.example: The GS apples were ripe and sweet.

words.definition: To roast something is to cook it in an oven or over a fire.
words.example: We GS roasted a chicken for dinner.

words.definition: A routine is a set of actions that you do regularly.
words.example: My GS morning routine includes exercise.

words.definition: A scheme is a plan or system.
words.example: The GS company has a new scheme for saving money.

words.definition: If someone is slim, they are thin.
words.example: She GS is very slim because she exercises every day.

words.definition: A stove is a piece of equipment used for cooking food.
words.example: The GS stove was very hot.

words.definition: A theft is the act of stealing something.
words.example: The GS police are investigating the theft of the car.
